Package client.guiControls

Class DisplayController

java.lang.Object
client.guiControls.DisplayController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssetsController, BuyController, OrdersController, OrganisationalUnitsController, SaleController, UsersController
public class DisplayController
extends java.lang.Object
A view-only controller that can interact with a MainController to update the view it controls.

    • sendRequest

      public <T extends IData> Response sendRequest​(java.lang.String action, T attachment, java.lang.Class<T> attachmentType) throws InvalidArgumentValueException
      Pass the request to the mainController and in turns, be sent to the database.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the attachment.
      Parameters:
      action - The request action "query", Request.ActionType.CREATE, Request.ActionType.UPDATE, Request.ActionType.DELETE
      attachment - The attachment related to the request.
      attachmentType - The type of the attachment that can be read.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentValueException
